textBox.richText: Following a painful 2 year hiatus it was time to catchup with our great Canadian friends Steph and James! Following their arrival from Toronto (once all the hugs and gawking at Steph’s ridiculously huge engagement ring had finished) we headed up to the Hollywood Hills. Trip Advisor gave us a few pointers on a little known location that required a drive through some windy, narrow streets. Once we made it to the top we were greeted with an amazing unobstructed view of the classic landmark only a couple of hundred metres away. After a quick bite at Urth Caffe (an Entourage favourite) We dropped down to the Kodak Theatre to take in the glitz and glamour of Hollywood. God knows where that is as all we ended up experiencing was a a zoo primarily filled with Michael Jackson impersonators.
